metadata.name: NiX ID #1
metadata.description:
A COLLECTION OF 1000 PFPs
Afterorder is a NFT project featuring Cyberpunk Collectible Cards set in the year 2121. Each character has their own personality, and we want our limited edition Nix ID’s to reflect that.

Our characters are made up of over one hundred traits ranging from heads, clothes, faces, eyewear, and backgrounds. Each character is unique and has been randomized with its own selection of traits to keep the characters’ essence.

Each character is a unique, non-fungible token (NFT) on the Ethereum blockchain

OUR FUTURE PLANS
Afterorder is more than an NFT project. We are working hard on the creation of our universe to make a video game in which you can find utility in every asset we produce.

Our PFP collection will act as a distinctive badge and avatar that will be verified within our game. This badge will  represent you as one of our OG collectors and earliest supporters. That’s not all. We are always working on ways to provide more powerful utility in the future.
